message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $90, but I'm still not comfortable selling it at that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'd be willing to pay $100 for the product. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
